website_summaries.verdict: This floating pool alarm is designed to activate when a child or pet falls into your pool.
pros: You can locate the alarm for this pool sensor up to 200 feet away from the device
The device simply floats on top of your pool water
Will react to waves when you turn it on
You can adjust the sensitivity if you find it is going off too easily
Remote can turn on or off the device
cons: This device does not come with an app for your phone like others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Failed after one year
customer_reviews.text: Save your money, It lasted one year and died. The alarm started becoming over sensitive and going off for no reason. Finally it would not turn off at all unless you remove the battery. It was great when it worked but now it a lot of wasted money for something that is not repairable.
customer_reviews.author: WayneG

customer_reviews.title: ... are simple and set it properly and it works fine. Pool filter and Hayward pool cleaner and hose ...
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions that are simple and set it properly and it works fine. Pool filter and Hayward pool cleaner and hose do not set it off. Light splashes are okay, but ours will go off for bigger waves from a dog paddle or plunk spash over 10 lbs. It is very adjustable. The alarm is loud enough and the indoor wall plug alarm can be heard easily; reset is also easy. It resets itself after about 5 minutes. Pool Patrol works for us.
customer_reviews.author: MarcAL

customer_reviews.title: Fit our purpose but didnt last
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last very long before malfunction. Will raise rating depending on company response
customer_reviews.author: wayne lougheed

customer_reviews.title: Buy or not buy this product?
customer_reviews.text: If you have a pool that needs the water to circulate (with jets/pump), do NOT buy this product. If you pool is outdoors and is exposed to minimal wind, do NOT buy this product. This product is TOO sensitive (even if you adjust sensitivity) and will ONLY work on pools that do not need the water to circulate. This product might work if your pool have calm water, no jets, no pump, no WIND, that kind of environment pool, this product might work.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work properly
customer_reviews.text: I never write product reviews but decided to for this item. It worked fine at first, but now it goes off all the time. We have adjusted the sensitivity but it still goes off 3-4 times a day. So now it just sits on the side of the pool. We’ve had it 6 weeks and now it’s totally worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Johnna Leider

customer_reviews.title: This Pool Patrol worked great! We set it in the pool when all ...
customer_reviews.text: This Pool Patrol worked great! We set it in the pool when all were done playing in the pool and if one of the kids tried to go swimming when we were on vacation we knew right away to check out who was in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: JPI

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a month so product works as advertised. Peace of mind with the 4 yr old running the property. Its loud outside and loud alarm inside. Dial in sensitivity.......
customer_reviews.author: glenn

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: This is trash. I placed the remote alarm in a window sill on the second floor of our house, about 100' from the pool alarm - essentially an un-obscured line, and it didn't work. Then, the battery died after only 3 weeks of use - waking my family and all adjacent neighbors up at 2AM. I'll return this ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Really sensitive
customer_reviews.text: When the pool pump starts to run, this alarm can be heard through out the house. Had to adjust sensitivity but other than that its great
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Best we have seen.
customer_reviews.text: We have little ones and an inground pool. We have taken all measures of safety with gates and fences. This is our extra precaution. You can adjust the sensitive and it works great. Easy to turn off and loud enough to hear outside and the indoor monitor also is a great alert for inside our house. If you need something to add extra protection this is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy!
customer_reviews.text: Update: no longer works. Pool patrol not helpful whatsoever and very annoying... used it a handful of times. Dont buy little pricey, but overall no complaints at all... also helps that its recommended by the state of California over the competition!
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Worked only 1 month unfortunately:(
customer_reviews.text: Really liked product once I found the correct setting for my needs (thus the 2 star rating for it being easy to set up & no drilling into my pool deck). BUT, after having just 1 month out of the blue, the alarm was tripped & I couldn’t turn off high pitched sound until I completely unscrewed battery compartment vs just turning it over to reset unit. I thought maybe changing out the battery would resolve the issue but as soon as I hooked up the new 9volt battery, my ears were blasted again so I had to quickly detach wires from battery. I then packed it up and return product. Disappointing....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We had trouble from the get go with this product. After soldering a faulty wire back together inside the unit, it did work for about a month. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Blackwood

customer_reviews.title: Went off with every ripple
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work in our daughters pool. It went off with every ripple despite adjusting the sensitivity. They also have a pool vacuum which made this product unusable (unless she went out 3x/day to take the alarm out of the pool). Daughter has a new house with a pool. They were unable to use it right after it was delivered due to closing on the house etc. When trying to return the company would not accept the return since it was just past the 30 day amazon policy. We just wanted our grandchildren to be safe - but this wasn't the answer for them and cautious grandparents clicked the Amazon buy option too soon. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: G59

customer_reviews.title: 200.00 wasted
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with this product. Bought it and worked for about 5 days then the alarm sounded and wouldn't turn off. Checked online to no resolve it would not reset or turn off after 3 minutes. Decieded to remove the cover that said do not remove to check for water and sure enough it was drenched. When I removed the cover it had a thin wire that broke off so needless to say it went into the trash. I didn't see them replacing it after I blantently removed a cover that said do not remove but the cause was water inside.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very nice safety feature to add to your pool to protect kids and dogs. The remote receiver just adds to the protection. Looked at a similar system at a local pool supply company at 2 to 3 times the price
customer_reviews.author: cas

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Not hard to install, has a switch you can keep in the house to turn off and on, it is very sensitive and goes off constantly, I find I keep it off which defeats the purpose!
customer_reviews.author: SRow5513

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Alarm never goes off and I can not return. I only used it for a few days and the alarm started and never stopped out of the water. Lousy and you do not get a return even though it is defective. Not a nice thing when we are trying to keep toddlers from drowning.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with the pump on
customer_reviews.text: The alarm is great if you don’t have a pool pump on. When our pump is running though there is no way to set the alarm sensitivity to adjust accordingly. Meaning it will always get set off with the pump on. We bought this for a new above ground pool. Unfortunately we haven’t been able to use this once.
customer_reviews.author: NJMommy

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last one summer, but lasted just long enough for the return window to run out. $214 door stop.
customer_reviews.author: MelG

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC SAFETY PLUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!!! Easy to figure out! That has me giving it 5 stars right there! The remote is super loud too. This is a great safety accessory for all parents, grandparents, pet owners and anyone with a pool!
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Ball

customer_reviews.title: pool alarm hard to get right
customer_reviews.text: The installation is very easy and the alarm works well but it's hard to get it adjusted for the proper weight. I have 2 puppies and a toddler and it doesn't go off when they're getting on to the pool. I'll have to keep working on it to see if I can get it right.
customer_reviews.author: Nancysrq

customer_reviews.title: A tad sensitive
customer_reviews.text: These serve their purpose well but if the wide picks the water up at all the siren will go off and your neighbors might worry. You can adjust the sensitivity but it's difficult to get it just right.
customer_reviews.author: Carrillo Family

customer_reviews.title: Yes. Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as described. Take a moment to read the instructions AND look underneath the alarm to understand how it works. Once I dialed it in precisely (about two minutes, literally) it delivered consisten reliable performance all summer long. Hint: if it erroneously sounds the alarm the moment you place it in the pool, you either set it down to hard, or there's a little moisture trapped along the inner ring. I simply shook outt the moisture and it was back to normal operation.
customer_reviews.author: wobeba

customer_reviews.title: Worth the added expense.
customer_reviews.text: This is more expensive than others out there but exactly as shown. Works great. Has sensitivity setting. Indoor and outdoor alarm that’s very loud and effective. Built to last hopefully many summers. Vet high quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: stopped working less than year old
customer_reviews.text: What do I need to do for a return please. used one season and have done all I need to replace batteries, reset etc and does not work. 234. 00 is high price for unreliable product.
customer_reviews.author: R.F

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easy, won’t stop ringing and not very helpful costumer service.
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about 2 weeks and then it won’t stop ringing. As soon as I try to put in the batteries it starts to ring and won’t stop until I unplug the batteries. Call the company and they told me it will be replaced, filled out the form on their website 3 weeks ago and still have not heard from the company. Very disappointed and would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: chwong

customer_reviews.title: Just Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: The Pool Alarm worked great for about 6 months...then it just stopped working. Alarm starting to go off even with turned upside down. We had to eventually take the battery out and we just trashed it.
customer_reviews.author: Superose

customer_reviews.title: Returned product
customer_reviews.text: Helped my in-laws buy this for their in-ground pool. Worked for 2-3wks then it malfunctioned and alarm wouldn’t turn off. Returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: wine.wife

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We've found that this works really really well. It very rarely has a false alarm. We also really appreciated the excellent customer service we received when we needed a replacement part. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah G.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: After adjusting the water level and sensitivity per the instructions, this worked well for a few weeks. Suddenly, I started getting random alarms without motion. I dried it out but now I can't get it to go into the water without alarming. I just contacting the vendor so we will see their response. It is an expensive item to have such a short lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kaempfe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for my old unit I had. It is simple and loud enough to hear from inside the home.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a couple months then the alarm sound became so faint that it couldn’t be heard. Changed batteries more than once ..no change
customer_reviews.author: Captrap

customer_reviews.title: Alarm does not sound
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product 6 weeks ago. It worked when we initially set it up and tested it. Today we had our final inspection of our pool, and the alarm doesn't work anymore. Very disappointing product - I ended up buying 6 door alarms today. There is no option to return the product, either.
customer_reviews.author: Jochen Ostermann

customer_reviews.title: Very sensitive, goes off easily.
customer_reviews.text: Very sensitive. I read instructions but still goes off very easily. Resetting is a cinch. Works for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for about 3 weeks and now won’t work. I’m 5 days past return date and will continue to try and contact seller And I did change the battery
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dial

customer_reviews.title: Goes off in light rain and doesn’t cover much area
customer_reviews.text: Even on low sensitivity, it goes off in the rain. And on high sensitivity mode it did not work when my husband got into the water of our small pool. It was difficult to get it to connect to indoor alarm. Anchoring the pool alarm was also frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Pool Patrol PA-30 Pool Alaram
customer_reviews.text: It works great. We loved the product. Easy instructions, we installed in 5-minutes. May be a suggestion to the manufacturer to improve the installation process-- a picture showing how it would look in the pool after install would help! We had a two-day event at our house with lots of children (small), so, we were afraid of the safety, and installed this alram. Everytime someone dipped their feet causing a wave or made a splash-- the alram sounded-- just how we wanted! Aftersome time children got scared to go to the pool-- and requested their moms to "to-turn it off"!! It was amazingly effective!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Not that great. Goes off even when it is a little windy
customer_reviews.author: DealsLover

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pool Alram
customer_reviews.text: We have one for the pool and one for the spa. Both work together with one in house receiver. Sensitivity adjusts by merely unscrewing the bottom just a little bit, or 11 year old son could do it. Fast install unscrew base insert 9 volt battery screw Phillips screw back in and your good to go. Durable and easy. Will pass final pool inspection.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Hayden

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this unit
customer_reviews.text: Unit worked for about 2 weeks. Then alarm sounded and would not shut off or reset. Had to remove the battery. I do not recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: David Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm and Outstanding Service!!
customer_reviews.text: The alarm work great once you adjust correctly. The service is outstanding. We had an issue with it and the company sent out a new one right away. Could not ask for more!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: ... give the final inspection of installing our pool they loved our pool alarm and how it worked every time ...
customer_reviews.text: When the county came out to give the final inspection of installing our pool they loved our pool alarm and how it worked every time they tested it. Thanks for a great alarm.
customer_reviews.author: rockie

customer_reviews.title: Great peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: Used this in my pool when my grandchildren came to visit me in Florida. Works just like it stated. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to pool fence
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little adjustment but the payoff is a beautiful pool without an ugly fence.
customer_reviews.author: Drummerman951

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistant sensitivity setting
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but it is very inconsistent when setting the sensitivity level. It works great for a day or so and then it sounds off in when it's in the same environment. It is how ever less expensive than building a gated fence around the pool are and meets city codes.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: CANT PUT IN POOL WITHOUT SETTING OFF ALARM
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great but even when I adjust the sensitivity to a level that wouldn't even be useful I can't place it in the pool without the alarm going off. Don't waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: BRUSKY1980

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 3 months. Not nearly good enough for the 230.00 price tag. Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Sherye H.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to set up. A little sensitive alarm, but easily adjusted. It takes a little patience.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tested really well, now we put it to practical use. Had a scare the other day..Never again..
customer_reviews.author: John Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: this was very expensive for what it is and it took a lot to get the alarm to sound. and if you turn it to be more sensitive then the wind blowing the water sets it off.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I can not for the life of me get this pool alarm to work properly. Just when I thought the sensitivity was correct by son gets in the pool, splashing , and falls in. No alarm. We replaced the batteries and played with the settings. Can NOT rely on it!!!! Very upset and heartbroken. I was hoping this would help with my return to work but only makes it more problematic!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: if your pool is big you need more than one
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product. Easy to install and you can adjust the sensitivity. Works well. They should only think of reducing the price a bit so they will be able to sell more .
customer_reviews.author: Ali Sulaiman

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST. Simple to setup - adjustable sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST. Simple to setup - adjustable sensitivity. Passed my Southern California Pool Inspection safety requirements. No drilling into side of my pool to hang or another type. Indoor alarm is powered by AC, the floating alarm uses 9V battery. Just flip it over or remove from pool when not needed. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Piranha

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to use this product on my pool, gave it away.
customer_reviews.author: sheila goepfert

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get it!
customer_reviews.text: Had it six weeks and alarm now only makes a tiny beeping sound that is barely audible. Changed batteries and still the same thing! Too late to supposedly return this piece of junk!! Do not get it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: too sensitive. Ended up giving it away to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Irina S-P

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 2 months. The alarm will not shut off! It does not matter if it is in the pool or not. Horrible customer service. I emailed the dealer and did not receive any response. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Korina DeHerrera

customer_reviews.title: Good value and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Late in my construction I was told that I needed to have a floating alarm for both the pool and the spa. I purchased this one, since it is a true floating alarm. Other items needed to be attached to the coping of the new pool which I was not to thrilled about. The best information that I found out, was that both of the floating alarms can communicate to the one alarm that I have in the house. If you have two of these like I do you will only need to have one alarm in the house. Also, I live in an area that has high winds, the sensitivity can be adjusted to accommodate the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wolken

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Product is too sensitive. Could not adjust to activate anything falling in water. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Helton

customer_reviews.title: Baby saver!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Loud and not overly sensitive. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: kathyrn malatino

customer_reviews.title: Working as we had hoped
customer_reviews.text: So far we are very pleased with this pool alarm. My son set the alarm sensitivity (with a bit of testing.) I’ll review again at the end of the season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This was great while it lasted. It stopped working after 2 months!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Pool Safety
customer_reviews.text: The pool alarm works fine. Just have to find the right setting. It is also good and loud!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Sembler

customer_reviews.title: A pool splash alarm that works good!
customer_reviews.text: Well this pool alarm works and does just what it says it'll do. Little splashes don't set it off but it will definitely alarm when something bigger, like a cat or dog or child hits and beats the water. It works as stated, I can't complain. Like all pool splash alarms, it will be limited as to use during the winter with a pool cover over it and in spring and summer in tremendous rain storms it'll be activated and alarm and you'll have to run out in the storm to set it out of the pool or endure it's screech.
customer_reviews.author: tom burks

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use seems to work well I do wish it was a little thinner so my pool cover could go over it
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but really good !
customer_reviews.text: Pefrect for our indoor pool! No false alarms and really effective!
customer_reviews.author: DESO

customer_reviews.title: Pool Patrol is on Guard!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product without hesitation. If installed properly, it works as described.
customer_reviews.author: W. B. Wethington

customer_reviews.title: Dud
customer_reviews.text: Product filled with water and didn’t work after first use
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Schenk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Worked great in our test. Look forward to using it full time next season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drains battery fast
customer_reviews.text: It works, but the fresh battery lasts only about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Iza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant and easy to use-gave us real peace of mind on our holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Noakes

customer_reviews.title: kind of weak product
customer_reviews.text: Sound is too week. Not as happy with this as other products like it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the alarm and less than a year later I was getting false alarms. I sent it back, they "fixed it" but I'm still getting false alarms. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Woofus

customer_reviews.title: Splash has to be very close to the alarm, if not, it won't work well.
customer_reviews.text: The battery drains out too quickly. Also, the splash to be very close to the pool alarm before it alarms. I can't guarantee that my son will fall close to the pool alarm. My pool is not big but it looks like I need at least 5 to be safe?
customer_reviews.author: Jen Hudson

customer_reviews.title: I had to send this back. When the battery ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this back. When the battery was connected it just SCREAMED !!!!!! There was no way to get it to stop except by taking the battery out, which mad it worthless.It was $200 of junk
customer_reviews.author: lola

customer_reviews.title: It works just like it stated
customer_reviews.text: It works just like it stated. We let our little girl hear the alarm. Now she wont go near the pool if its in there.
customer_reviews.author: Marianna Thornburgh

customer_reviews.title: good product - passes LA city inspection for pool alarm
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, adjustable for wave level, works well. Tethers to the side of the pool. product met my expectation
customer_reviews.author: svensls

customer_reviews.title: The seller was good about refunding my money
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. The seller was good about refunding my money, but I couldn't get the inside the house part of the alarm to work.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Burns

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my daughter. After she thanked ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. After she thanked me, she said she had a water-fall in her pool & was it OK that she sent it to her sister who has a pool without a water-fall. My older daughter had a small dog drown in her pool!
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product until it stopped working just after three ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product until it stopped working just after three weeks. I still have it but unsure on what to do with it now. So upsetting as I wanted to use this just in case since I have small children.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: It won't stop!!
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid attention to the other reviews. It would scream as soon as I turned it over. Do no buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia A. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: A Must have for pools
customer_reviews.text: Amazing a real safety device for the pool and family
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: Between false alarms and water in the battery housing after a week this was not for us. Probably too many wild animals in our yard for it to work practically anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Brian in Mass

customer_reviews.title: Perfect no drill ASTM pool alarm
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed to pass inspection without having to drill into the concrete.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Useless. Didn't work basically right out of the box. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: mediamst

customer_reviews.title: don'the waste your money, poor quality/design
customer_reviews.text: The low battery alarm went off continuously despite using several new batteries, resetting many times, etc. Only one star I have ever given.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Won't turn off
customer_reviews.text: Earsplitting alarm does not defuse after 5 seconds. Want to return - waste of money. Probably going to issue a chargeback
customer_reviews.author: Alex Morgan

customer_reviews.title: This works great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a big family gathering as some of our relatives have very young children. The set up worked well and we tied it off with a rope so that it would be stable in the center of the pool. We were able to relax and feel confident that everyone would be safe for our gathering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: It can be adjusted well. the sensitative is great and is very easy to adjusted in case of winds.. I have four minqture chaw. that can;t get out of the pool by themselfs.. This work well if they fall in.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Do not Buy it
customer_reviews.text: At first it works fine but then it stop working without a specific reason. I tried to return it but amazon only gives 30 days. If I was you, I would not buy this alarm. Its your child life!!$
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McNamara

customer_reviews.title: We feel much safer now having this alarm!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 4 year old and 2 year old twins and an above ground pool. The alarm works terrific, was easy to set up, and gives us total peace of mind. I love that it came with the alarm for the house as well as we have a fenced in yard. So I'm able to be inside the house while the kids are out playing in the yard, knowing that we have an alarm that I will be able to hear whether indoors or outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: We just got it and it works fine for our pool by now
customer_reviews.text: We just got it and it works fine for our pool by now. There is no false alarms and we have tested many times!!! It is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Way over priced. The battery wears down too quickly. I feel like I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Armbruster

customer_reviews.title: Kindof a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this pool alarm for this past summer because we had a 3 year old son (now 4) and we just wanted a way to be "sure" that we would know if he somehow got into the pool without our knowledge. The concept is great with the indoor sound indicator but execution is lacking as the alarm goes off with seemingly little disturbance- wind disturbs it enough to trigger it. My husband tried fiddling with it to make it work for us but we ended up just not using it at all after multiple false alarms. Wish I could have my $175 back. ={
customer_reviews.author: brandi in louisiana

customer_reviews.title: omg shut it off
customer_reviews.text: we cant get the dang thing to shut off, tried to reset it, took out the battery, minute you put it back in it wails again not very useful
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E. Gieske

customer_reviews.title: Nice. but cheaply constructed
customer_reviews.text: The construction of such light plastic surprised me. We have had several false alarms, but we are adjusting it. The indoor remote really is loud, so hopefully even though it is so lightly constructed, it will work!!
customer_reviews.author: jeannine de

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what I need
customer_reviews.text: I placed it in the middle of a 35 foot long pool. I had my 30 pound grandson jump in on one end and the alarm did not go off. I set it to the most sensitive setting (according to the instructions) and tried it again. It still didn't go off. When I make a wave right beside it with my hand the alarm blasts and the remote receiver works. Unfortunately, this device does me no good if it won't detect the waves made when my grandchildren jump in.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Russell K. Baker

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Tried it for a few times. its rubbish. waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Itai Shemesh

customer_reviews.title: Quick Shipping
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought it late in the season and have not used it yet, wait until next spring to use

product_meta.title: Pool Patrol PA-30 Pool Alarm
feature_bullets: Easy to install with no damage to your pool
Adjustable sensitivity to reduce false alarms
Works in any type, shape, or size pool or spa
Multiple alarms can be used in larger pools
